comment: Compute the ` X ` coefficient in a sum with an independent vector ` X ` (first conjunct), which can then be removed to continue with the remaining vectors summed in expressions ` Y ` and ` Z ` (second conjunct). Typically, ` U ` is the span of the remaining vectors. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2022.)
